name: Sigmapoint
description:
Sigmapoint is a Cracow based software company specializing in developing mobile apps for iOS, Android, Windows Phone and backend systems in Python, Node.js, Java & Scala.
Since 2012 we had a pleasure to work with many clients including enterprises, brands and startups from United States, United Kingdom, Germany and Sweden.
Our experience in developing dozens of apps paired with skilled developers team and Agile/Scrum approach give us the confidence to provide the best services in building a high performing software for mobile devices.
Awards & Recognition: Internet Beta 2012, Google for Entrepreneurs, Techweek 2013, Global Startup Challenge
